row.Docu:
The integration to Jenkins consists an action, which executes a (parametrized) Jenkins build job.
=Supported versions=
See http://docs.automic.com/compatibility/?len=Package.Jenkins&comp=PCK.AUTOMIC_JENKINS&version=1.0.0
=Setup= Package have only 1 action "Triggers a new build in Jenkins" which can executes a (parametrized) Jenkins build job.
=Version History=
*v1.1.6: Bugfix Fix issue of fail to load a log library and NullPointerException even when trigger build successful and build number is returned.
*v1.1.5: Bugfix Fix issue of - Fail on post process when returned build number >10 - Cannot get build number in some cases - Unmeaningful message
*v1.1.4: Refactor Remove unsued lgpl dependencies
*v1.1.3: Bugfix Fix issue of - Security in used library - Fail of trigger buil when application contains space
*v1.1.2: Enhancement + bugfix - Enahncement: Adapt action follows standalization of all action packs - Bugfix: Fix issue of Can't get build number when build number >1000
*v1.1.1: Bugfix Fix issue of UnrecognizedPropertyException when execute action Trigger Build
*v1.1.0: Enhancement Return the build number of the triggered build the action is waiting for
*v1.0.0: New version Add Action Trigger Build
